mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(STUDY_NUM) FROM TBL_STUDY
WHERE STUDY_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE.TBL_USER_IMG (USER_IMG_NUM, STUDY_NUM, USER_IMG_NAME, USER_IMG_UUID) VALUES(SEQ_USER_IMG.NEXTVAL, #{studyNum}, #{userImgName}, #{userImgUuid})
mapper.select: SELECT ts.STUDY_NUM , ts.USER_NUM , ts.STUDY_TITLE , tu.USER_NICK , ts.STUDY_UPLOAD_DATE , ts.STUDY_LIMIT , ts.STUDY_DEADLINE , ts.STUDY_START_TIME , ts.STUDY_END_TIME , ts.STUDY_START_DAY , ts.STUDY_END_DAY , tu.USER_PH , ts.STUDY_LOCATION , ts.STUDY_DESCRIPT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDY_APPLY tsa WHERE tsa.STUDY_NUM = ts.STUDY_NUM) AS participants FROM TBL_STUDY ts JOIN TBL_USER tu ON ts.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM WHERE ts.STUDY_NUM = #{studyNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_STUDY ts WHERE STUDY_NUM = #{studyNum}
